page.title: 12Leisure in Rawdon-Children
page.content: Leisure activities for young people include a youth club at Benton Park School,a Drama Club called Young Idea at St.John's Church and the Rawdon Army Cadet Detachment at Greenacre Hall.There are Junior teams at Rawdon Cricket Club and Yarnbury Rugby Club. The most popular activity is the{ {Scout and Guide Movement}.In Rawdon there are two cub packs,one scout company,a Beaver colony,four Brownie packs and two Guide companies. In our school there are 8 Beavers,30 Cubs,4 Scouts,35 Brownies and 13 Guides making a total of 90 children in the movement.Meetings are held at the Jubilee Hall behind St.Peters Church,and at Trinity Church on New Road Side.
